title: Woman Faces Backlash After Wearing Body Paint To Gym
description:
Influencer Natalie Reynolds is facing backlash for having worn body paint to a gym. She claims that her decision was made as part of a “social experiment.” This experiment was shared on social media. She can be seen in a clip where a fellow gym member politely calls her attire “inappropriate.” He continued to tell [...]
